title.narrative: Towards Universal Access to Sexual Reproductive Health and Rights Services in the Somali Region (UNFPA)

description.narrative: Better access to SRHR services, including family planning, leading to increased resilience of drought affected women and their families by creatign linkages between humanitarian food distribution and SRHR/FP activities. ( results framework has been revised in 2019)

title.narrative: Estimated number of unintended pregnancies averted, unsafe abortions averted, maternal deaths averted as a result of contraceptive use

description.narrative: Nationally, by 2016, Ethiopia managed to avert 1.8 million unintended pregnancies, 0.5 million unsafe abortions and 5000 maternal deaths as a result of modern contraceptive use. Baseline for the project will be set based on assessment to be conducted.
